data.event: It was torn down in 1967 by the Tennessee Valley Authority due to health concerns over its proximity to a nearby coal-burning electric plant, Paradise Fossil Plant.

event.title: was established at Paradise on March 1, 1852

data.event: A post office was established at Paradise on March 1, 1852; it closed in 1967.
A post office was established at Paradise on March 1, 1852; it closed in 1967.
In 1959, the TVA built a coal plant at the former site of Paradise.
